label: 鏁子
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 55th  . Nara National Museum . 2003
説明文: A key and padlock in the shape of a shrimp. The padlock consists of a rounded female part and a male portion that fits into it. These form a unit with a spoon-shaped key. The first Chinese character in the word sasu means chain" indicating the derivation of the word from latching the door with a chain."
